meanings.definition: The position or role of a headmaster.
meanings.sent1: Her father's headmasterships at different schools allowed her to experience various educational environments.
meanings.sent2: The headmasterships in the district were all filled by experienced educators.
meanings.sent3: The headmasterships of the two rival schools often led to friendly competitions.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his headmasterships made him a respected figure in the community.
meanings.sent5: The responsibilities of headmasterships require strong leadership skills.

meanings.definition: The term of office of a headmaster.
meanings.sent1: During his headmasterships, the school saw significant improvements in academic performance.
meanings.sent2: The headmasterships of the previous administrators were marked by a focus on discipline.
meanings.sent3: The headmasterships of the past seemed to have lasted longer than those today.
meanings.sent4: She approached her headmasterships with a sense of duty and commitment.
meanings.sent5: The headmasterships of the school were known for their dedication to student success.
